title: Telecom Subscription
description: Collects all generic details related to a customer's telecom subscription plan, including pricing, package, and included features.

xdm:responsiblePartyID.title: Responsible Party ID
xdm:responsiblePartyID.description: Identifier for the person responsible for the subscription, which typically could be their device phone number.

xdm:subscriptionType.title: Subscription Type
xdm:subscriptionType.description: Indicates the type of telecom subscription in which the customer is enrolled.

xdm:bundleName.title: Bundle Name
xdm:bundleName.description: Captures the name of any type of subscription bundle in which the customer is enrolled, such as 'Internet + TV'.

xdm:subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
xdm:subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

xdm:activationDate.title: Activation Date
xdm:activationDate.description: Tracks the date in which the telecom subscription was activated.

xdm:deactivationDate.title: Deactivation Date
xdm:deactivationDate.description: Tracks the date in which the telecom subscription was deactivated.

xdm:equipmentFees.title: Equipment Fees
xdm:equipmentFees.description: Captures any equipment fees for items such as routers, modems, recievers, etc.

xdm:equipmentInsurance.title: Equipment Insurance
xdm:equipmentInsurance.description: Tracks if a customer has opted-in to equipment insurance for the subscription.
